backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with maps for journeys, locations, media, schedules, bookmarks, and includes blob-storage plus types for all data models.
backend/migration.mo: Contains migration logic converting old schedule items to the new format by adding the journeyCity field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs for journey‑aware map behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing the purpose and recent changes across key frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the root React application and includes the SunCalc script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global providers and renders the BackendDebugger and LocationMapExplorer.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for managing journeys and schedule items with date‑range selection and multiple management panels.
Exposes backend actor and debug utilities to the browser console for development use.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: Manages city albums, including media uploads, validation, social media links, and album selection.
frontend/src/components/CityloguePanel.t: Empty or placeholder file with no content.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: Provides UI for importing, browsing, searching, and editing Geoname city data with pagination and file upload parsing.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Implements a 10-heart interactive rating widget with partial fills and click-based rating adjustments.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: Renders a 3D interactive globe with time zones, city markers, animations, and configurable display layers.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog for adding, editing, uploading, and deleting location photos tied to geographic coordinates.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Authentication panel handling Internet Identity login/logout with status display and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: Leaflet-based map component that loads travel spots, schedule items, and bookmarks, rendering markers and popups with media and controls.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: Displays photos, videos, and embedded social media links in a tabbed media gallery with YouTube/Instagram parsing.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: Admin interface for creating, editing, and managing music albums and songs, including file uploads and queries.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: User-facing music browser that lists albums and songs, allowing selection and playback via a dialog UI.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: Audio player bar that plays songs from albums, handling playback, volume, progress, and external song selection.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Provides UI to upload, validate, store, and manually sync timezone GeoJSON data using backend actor and IndexedDB.
Displays and edits journey itineraries with filtering, date formatting, and schedule item management.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: Manages travel spots with CRUD operations, geocoding, media uploads, and social media links via custom hooks.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Shows bookmarked and travel spot vibes grouped by city, enriched with spot types and icons for filtering and focus actions.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: Allows users to view and edit website layout preferences such as UI options, search defaults, and display settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks and utilities for backend interactions, including geocoding, country normalization, and social media URL validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers, custom CSS variables for themes, and global styling including dark and light mode rules.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Provides a function to compute solar declination by day of year and includes console-based test cases.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Offers utilities to determine timezone IDs for a given UTC offset with quarter‑hour precision using Intl-based calculations.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Provides timezone boundary loading and caching logic using IndexedDB and backend fetches.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Implements timezone overlay rendering on a 3D globe with utilities for coordinate handling, offset matching, and group management.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CountryMapExplorer.ts: Empty placeholder page component for country map exploration.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: Interactive 2D/3D map explorer with search, panels, overlays, and time‑zone display controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata and feature requirements for integrating journey-based schedule items into the 2D map.
